name: CombineTier Factory
desc: Factory for CombineTier which is a tier contract to combine reports of some other tier contracts based on an expression.

inputs.name: combinedTiersLength
inputs.desc: The first N values in the constants array of the expressionConfig MUST be all the combined tiers that are known statically. Of course some tier addresses MAY only be known at runtime and so these cannotbe included.

expressions.name: CombineTier Report
expressions.desc: An expression that determines the report of a CombineTier contract.

cells.name: Caller
cells.desc: The contract or EOA that called transfer

cells.name: This Contract
cells.desc: The address of the CombineTier contract this expression is for
